Package: com.aestasit.infrastructure.winrm

[Groovy] Class DefaultWinRM

    • com.aestasit.infrastructure.winrm.DefaultWinRM

    • Default "static" implementation of WinRM DSL to be used inside plain Groovy scripts.

      Authors:
      Andrey Adamovich
